Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class Odometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Odometer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The odometer class keeps track of the robot's (x, y, theta) deltaPosition.
    Author:
    Rodrigo Silva, Dirk Dubois, Derek Yu, Karim El-Baba, Michael Smith, Younes Boubekeur, Olivier St-Martin Cormier

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static int[] currTacho
      The current motor tacho counts.
      private static double[] deltaPosition
      The instantaneous change in position (dx, dy, dTheta).
      private java.util.concurrent.locks.Condition doneResetting
      Lets other threads know that a reset operation is over.
      private boolean isResetting
      Indicates if a thread is trying to reset any position parameters.
      private static int LEFT  
      private static java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock lock
      Fair lock for concurrent writing.
      private static Odometer odo
      The singleton odometer instance.
      private static int[] prevTacho
      The previous motor tacho counts (from previous iteration of while loop).
      private static int RIGHT  
      private double theta
      The orientation (heading) in degrees.
      private double x
      The x-axis position in meters.
      private double y
      The y-axis position in meters.

    • Method Detail

      • getOdometer

        public static Odometer getOdometer()
        Returns the Odometer Object. Use this method to obtain an instance of Odometer.

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • updateDeltaPosition

        public static void updateDeltaPosition​(int[] prev,
                                       int[] curr,
                                       double theta,
                                       double[] deltas)
        Updates the robot deltaPosition (x, y, theta) given the motor tacho counts.
        Parameters:
        prev - the previous tacho counts of the motors
        curr - the current tacho counts of the motors
        theta - the current heading (angle) of the robot
        deltas - the deltaPosition array (x, y, theta)

      • printPosition

        public void printPosition()
        Prints odometer information to the console.

      • printPositionInTileLengths

        public void printPositionInTileLengths()
        Prints odometer information to the console with x and y in tile lengths (feet).

      • getXyt

        public double[] getXyt()
        Returns the Odometer data.

        odoData[0] = x; odoData[1] = y; odoData[2] = theta;

        Returns:
        the odometer data.

      • updateOdometerValues

        public void updateOdometerValues()
        Increments the current values of the x, y and theta instance variables given deltaPositions. Useful for odometry.

      • setXyt

        public void setXyt​(double x,
                   double y,
                   double theta)
        Overrides the values of x, y and theta. Use for odometry correction.
        Parameters:
        x - the value of x
        y - the value of y
        theta - the value of theta in degrees

      • setX

        public void setX​(double x)
        Overwrites x. Use for odometry correction.
        Parameters:
        x - the value of x

      • setY

        public void setY​(double y)
        Overwrites y. Use for odometry correction.
        Parameters:
        y - the value of y

      • setTheta

        public void setTheta​(double theta)
        Overwrites theta. Use for odometry correction.
        Parameters:
        theta - the value of theta

      • getPoint

        public Point getPoint()
        Returns:
        the current odometer position as a point
